title: Through the Looking Glass (Part 9)
description: Alice finds herself stuck between two argumentative, extremely critical Red and White queens. The queens fall asleep on her, and then vanish as she finds herself standing in front of a doorway that says "Queen Alice". Alice knocks and knocks, and is ultimately let in and hears a chorus of looking-glass creatures who are singing a song in celebration of her new found status as Queen Alice.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge before and during reading
